sentences.english: The conclusions are much helpful to protect the groundwater resource.
sentences.chinese: 這將有助於合理選擇廠址和地下水資源的保護。

sentences.english: It is the law, too , that manufacturers must list their name and places of business on their labels.
sentences.chinese: 法律規定廠家必須在標籤上註明他們的廠名和廠址。

sentences.english: To describe quantitative and qualitative analysis method in site selection of chemical enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 論述了化工企業廠址選擇的定性分析與定量分析方法。

sentences.english: We spend hours argue with the managing director about the site for the new factory.
sentences.chinese: 就新廠的廠址問題，我們與總經理爭論了幾個小時。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it points out that the two candidated sites of factory both have the geological conditions of selective site of factory.
sentences.chinese: 指出兩候選廠址都具有可選廠址的地質條件。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it points out that the two candidated sites of factory both have the geological conditions of selective site of factory.
sentences.chinese: 指出兩候選廠址都具有可選廠址的地質條件。

sentences.english: It will recommence once an agreement upon site has been identified and developed by the government.
sentences.chinese: 一旦政府確定了具體的廠址我們將重新開展項目。
